mapper.select: select t1.id , t1.order_number , t1.product_series , t1.product_type , t1.application_period , t1.application_amount , t1.financing_use , t1.additional_amount , t1.total_financing , t1.whether_transfer , t1.customer_source , t1.business_contacts , t1.business_phone , t1.entry_org_id , t1.store_appraiser , t1.customer_manager , t1.entry_date , t1.end_date , t1.approval_amount , t1.order_status , t1.doyou_approve , t1.approval_term , t1.creation_time , t1.update_time , t1.REGIONAL , t1.SUBREGIONAL , t1.AREA, t1.AUDITE_STATE from car_loan_info t1 where t1.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update car_loan_info t1 set t1.product_series =#{dto.productSeries,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.product_type =#{dto.productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.application_period =#{dto.productTerm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.application_amount =#{dto.applicationLimit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.financing_use =#{dto.financingPurposes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.additional_amount =#{dto.additionalCredits,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.total_financing =#{dto.expectedTotalFinancing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.whether_transfer =#{dto.isAgreedChangeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.customer_source =#{dto.customerSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.business_contacts =#{dto.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.business_phone =#{dto.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.store_appraiser =#{dto.storeAppraiser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.customer_manager =#{dto.customerManager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.entry_date =#{dto.entryDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.end_date =#{dto.endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.approval_amount =#{dto.approvalAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.order_status =#{dto.orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.doyou_approve =#{dto.doyouApprove,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.approval_term =#{dto.approvalTerm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.companydescription =#{dto.companyDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.familydescription =#{dto.familyDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.informationreport =#{dto.informationReport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.rfwquerysituation =#{dto.RFWQuerySituation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.gswquerysituation =#{dto.GSWQuerySituation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.telephoneverification =#{dto.telephoneVerification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.otherinformation =#{dto.otherInformation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.update_time =now(), t1.REGIONAL =#{dto.regional,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.SUBREGIONAL =#{dto.subRegional,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , t1.AREA =#{dto.area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.ENTRY_ORG_ID =#{dto.entryOrgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.ENTRY_ORG_NAME =#{dto.entryOrgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.SECOND_LEVEL_ID =#{dto.secondlevelid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.SECOND_LEVEL_NAME =#{dto.secondlevelname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.APPROVAL_PRODUCT_TYPE =#{dto.approvalProductType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where t1.ORDER_NUMBER = #{dto.orderNumber}
update car_loan_info t1 set t1.valid='0' where t1.id in( ${ids})
update car_loan_info t1 set t1.AUDITE_STATE =#{dto.auditeState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.update_time =CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where t1.id = #{dto.id}

update car_loan_info t1 set t1.approval_amount =#{dto.approvalAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.approval_term =#{dto.approvalTerm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.APPROVAL_PRODUCT_TYPE =#{dto.approvalProductType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} t1.update_time =CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where t1.id = #{dto.id}
mapper.select: select t1.id , t1.order_number , t1.product_series , t1.product_type , t1.application_period , t1.application_amount , t1.financing_use , t1.additional_amount , t1.total_financing , t1.whether_transfer , t1.customer_source , t1.business_contacts , t1.business_phone , t1.entry_org_id , t1.store_appraiser , t1.customer_manager , t1.entry_date , t1.end_date , t1.approval_amount , t1.order_status , t1.doyou_approve , t1.approval_term , t1.companydescription , t1.familydescription , t1.informationreport , t1.rfwquerysituation , t1.gswquerysituation , t1.telephoneverification , t1.otherinformation , t1.creation_time , t1.update_time , t1.regional , t1.subregional , t1.area , t1.entry_org_name , t1.second_level_id , t1.second_level_name , t1.audite_state , t1.operate_user , t1.one_start , t1.one_end , t1.autdit_end_time , t1.cre_user_id , t1.cre_last_user , t1.reaudit_start , t1.reaudit_end , t1.rec_audit_user from car_loan_info t1 where t1.order_number = #{orderNum}
